full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,YERMA DAR COG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(KHAN CHEN RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MDZAD PA DAM CAN RDOR LEGS KYI DAR LCOG RDZOGS, ,DAM CAN RTA MGRIN YANG SANG SEN PO CHEN PO'I GANG 'DOD KYIS DAR LCOG ,KHYAD PAR SO SOR KHA DOG NI TSE BSOD NAMS RGYAS PAR SOGS CHEN DU GSER PO, GOD KHA BYAD KHA CHED DU NAG CHA MI RKUN CES SBYAR SHAR CHED DU DMAR PO MI BA DANG MI NOR ZAS GSUM CHED DANG DKAR PO'I BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O, ,)
